header.headertext: AMENDMENTS TO BE MOVED ON REPORT

amendments.proposer: THE LORD BISHOP OF RIPON AND LEEDS

text.quote: 000: Clause 1, page 1, line 5, at end insert—
“(1A) The mandatory 1% up-rating stipulated in subsection (1) shall not apply—
text.IndentOne: (a) to any components of the employment and support allowance (including personal allowances);
(b) to sums specified in regulations under section 10(3) of the Welfare Reform Act 2012 in respect of an amount to be included under section 10(2) of that Act.”

text.quote: 000: The Schedule, page 4, line 10, at end insert “with the exception of statutory maternity pay”
